comments.html:
Regardless of the sanity of trying to build a multi-vendor fabrics (let's not go there), EVPN seems to be pretty solid when it comes to L2-only forwarding in simple environments (IGP + IBGP). L3 is still a bit murky (asymmetric versus symmetric), as is multi-fabric behavior (changing next hops on fabric edge).

The true "beauties" start when vendors try to persuade you to use "interesting" designs like running IBGP over EBGP for no good reason (apart from lock-in).
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
